short.am,ar,bn,ca,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es,es_4: Steam Market Item Price Tracker allows you to track Steam Community Market item buy/sell orders.
short.bg: Steam Market Цена Tracker ви позволява да проследявате продукта на пазара на Steam Community купуват / продават поръчки.
short.cs: Parní trh Položka Cena Tracker umožňuje sledovat parní komunitu na trhu položky koupit / prodávat objednávky.
short.da: Steam Market Price Price Tracker giver dig mulighed for at spore Damp Community Market item køb / sælge ordrer.
short.de: Dampfmarktpostenpreis Tracker ermöglicht es Ihnen, Dampfgemeinschaftsmarktartikel kaufen / verkaufen Bestellungen zu verfolgen.
short.el: Steam Market Item Tracker Tracker σάς επιτρέπει να παρακολουθείτε το στοιχείο της κοινότητας του ατμού αγοράς αγοράς / πώλησης…
short.fi: Höyrymarkkinat Tuote Trackerin avulla voit seurata höyryyhteisön markkinatuotteita ostamaan / myy tilauksia.
short.fr: Market Steam Article Price Tracker vous permet de suivre les commandes d'achat / de vente de la communauté de vapeur.
short.hu: Steam Market Elem Ár Tracker Lehetővé teszi, hogy nyomon kövesse a Steam közösségi piaci elemet vásároljon / eladjon…
short.it: Tracker del prezzo dell'articolo del mercato a vapore ti consente di monitorare gli ordini di acquisto / vendita dell'articolo di…
short.ja: Steam Market Item Price Trackerを使用すると、Steam Community Market Itemの購入/売り注文を追跡できます。
short.ko: 스팀 시장 항목 가격 추적기를 사용하면 스팀 커뮤니티 시장 항목 구매 / 판매 주문을 추적 할 수 있습니다.
short.nl: Stoommarkt Item Prijs Tracker stelt u in staat om de stoomcommunautaire marktitem te volgen kopen / verkopen bestellingen.
short.no: Steam Market Item Price Tracker lar deg spore Steam Community Market Item Kjøp / Selg bestillinger.
short.pl: Rynek parowy Pozycja Cena Tracker umożliwia śledzenie elementu rynku wspólnotowego Steam Cup / Sprzedaż zamówień.
short.ro: Steam Piata Price Pret Tracker vă permite să urmăriți obiectele de piață comunitare Steam Cumpărați / vindeți comenzi.
short.ru: The Steam Market Track Tracker позволяет вам отслеживать товар на рынке паровых сообщений.
short.th: Tracker ราคาสินค้าในตลาด Steam ช่วยให้คุณติดตามรายการตลาดชุมชน Steam ซื้อ / ขายคำสั่งซื้อ
short.tr: Steam Pazarı Öğe Fiyat Takibi, Steam Topluluk Pazarı öğe alım/satım siparişlerini izlemenizi sağlar.
short.uk: O item do mercado de vapor Price Tracker permite que você rastreie os pedidos / venda de mercado da comunidade Steam.

long.am,ar,bn,ca,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es,es_4:
Features:

* Shows you desktop notification when there is buy/sell prices changed by users preferences
* Dark/Light mode (for extension pages by browser settings)

Compatibility:
* This extension has been tested to work with Steam Market History Helper, Steam Inventory Helper, Enhanced Steam and CSGOFloat Market Checker
long.bg,cs,da,de,el,fi,fr,hu,it,ja,ko,nl,no,p:
Features:
